comment: This was one of the best professors I had. You learn about monsters and movies in that same genre. You do one powerpoint of a monster,illness, or superhero he gives, midterm, and final of a 6-8 page topic of your choosing related to a monster and make presentation such as a video. You can miss up to 3 days before you drop a letter grade.

Easy A but I didn't care for him.  Every assignment is about scary movies or stories, some classes are as short as 10 min, he doesn't give much feedback on papers and takes forever to put grades in. Our final was abstract and confusing without clear instructions. Wasn't my favorite teacher
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: He's funny and easy going.  Lectures are more like simple discussions.  Hardly any homework aside from a few papers.  Attendance is mandatory, but he gives you lots of leeway and he cancels class a lot.  Highly recommended if you need an easy A.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: His 1101 class consists of a few papers that are due very far apart, he grades easy and will help revise before the due date if you ask. The topics are fun and he let's you get really creative with them. Class time is usually either a helpful lecture or funny videos/stories.

Okay so here is the thing. You don't know any of your grades until the final grades come out but if you did the work you most likely will get an A! He is so funny and caring and I really enjoyed going to his class!!

I took Broome for English 1101- it was one of the best decisions I made all semester. His assignments are interesting (such as viewing & writing about a horror film), but they are not difficult since he is very clear on what he expects. No small assignments, just a few papers and projects. TAKE THIS CLASS

TAKE HIS CLASS! He is hilarious and super fun. My class had 3 papers, 1 group project, and 1 oral presentation. Mr. Broome chose interesting topics for each assignment and I looked forward to coming to his class everyday. The only downside is he doesn't post grades until they are due at the end of the semester.

This class made me sad that this was my last english class. When he lectures it's on interesting topics and sometimes we watched videos. Easy grader as he understands that there is no specific way to write and assigned midterm and final papers. Very casual and allows you to miss 3 classes before it takes off of your grade. I would totally reccomend

Very easy grader, but you won't know your exact grade until final grades are released. You're basically guaranteed a passing grade, though. I didn't learn a whole lot from his class; it was just four essays that he takes months to grade.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Great professor, really enjoyed his class! Has really unique topics and discussions. Honestly it was fun going.

He is obsessed with monsters and scary things. He is very odd but such an easy grader. Just follow his instructions on the assignments and you will get a solid A. Attendance counts so go to class. He lets out early a lot. Would definitely take again.

Broome is probably the best professor I have ever had. He is extremely funny, honest, and helpful. Much of class was spent watching movies and talking about zombies, monsters, and vampires. Only major assignment is a 6-8 page paper on monsters - super easy. I look forward to going to this class every week. You MUST take this class! LOVE IT!
Amazing guy, easy class, easiest A in my college career. You will love him! Sadly, he only teaches 1101 and 1102, so take him while you can! You'll regret it if you take anyone else.

Hardly 6 or 7 graded assignments the entire semester, and they are basically easy A's if you do as he says. Grades were never posted except for the overall final grade, which was annoying, but you know you'll make an A. Extremely nice guy and is very relatable. He's the type of guy you'd want to be friends with outside of class. Take him!

The only negative things to say are that grades are never posted online, & he is not clear on assignments in terms of what should be in it and such. That said, YOU WILL MAKE AN A WITH HIM! The only assignments the whole semester were an EASY midterm, 1 six page paper, 1 annotated bibliography,  & a presentation based on your paper. You'll LOVE him!

Literally make your schedule around this guy! Even if he's teaching an 8 AM or 8 PM, TAKE HIM! It will be the easiest A if your life. He is an amazing guy, and not only does he open up to the class, but he gives everyone the chance to in the form of discussion (doesn't get mad if no one participates). ONE 6 page paper the whole semester. That's it!

Professor Broome's class was easy. One paper the entire term, 6 pages, easy. Most classes we watched Youtube videos or watched clips of horror films. He let us out early every class, one time we only were in for about 15 minutes. Easy going guy, fair, understanding. If you have a hectic semester, his class will balance it out. I recommend!!

Prof Broome is the best. He is funny and cares that you enjoy class. His extra credit is a class jeopardy game! Every assignment is monster based which makes the class super interesting. There are no quizzes and he has his own attendance policy. I would take him again in a heartbeat.

Broome is a nice man and does a lot to make sure his students are successful. Being that this was his 1st time teaching we had a lot of mixups and confusion over assignments. Originally we were suposed to have 4 graded assignments, ended the semester with 1. If you are looking for a great Prof. thats not him, but he's good for an easy A

Best professor I've ever had. Super friendly guy, really easy class but probably because it was so fun. He loves the subject he teaches and cares about his students. The reading was light and just used for class discussion. Toward the end we had a movie day. One big paper with a little project as the final. Take this class! Hands down favorite prof

Professor Broome was hilarious!!! I loved him and would definitely take him again. His class is so easy, only 3 papers and 1 group project that he grades very easily. He never keeps you in class the whole time. Also his papers are about interesting topics.

I freaking loved Mr. Broome. He is SUCH a cool guy and most of our class was discussion-based. literal and figurative monsters was the theme of our class and it was honestly really interesting and I learned a lot. Take him. Just take him.

Awesome professor and awesome guy. He is super passionate about the subject (monsters) and it makes the class very enjoyable even if monsters aren't your thing.  All he asks is solid participation, which is easy to do as he starts conversations easily. Overall, amazing class. Must take.

Prof. Broome is the best English teacher I have ever had. He is understanding and willing to change requirements for papers. You will not have class if there is nothing for him to go over. The end of the semester was a little rushed but the assignments were fun. He is so popular among his students and I am lucky to have him for 1102.

I LOVED him as a professor! Easier teacher I have ever had. Had 3 papers but all were super easy and interesting. He is an easy grader and class is never longer than 30 minutes! I wish i could have gotten him again for 1102!

My favorite professor I've had. Made my 8 a.m. fun to go to. He's an easy grader, I've received an A on every paper. He'll let you out early if he has nothing else important to say. Really wish I could take him next semester!

Broome is one of my favorite teachers! He makes waking up for an 8 am not terrible. There are no tests or assigned reading, just a couple of papers and a final project. If he has nothing left to teach, he won't make you stay the whole class time. Attendance is mandatory. Show up, follow the directions for your papers, and you'll do fine!

10/10 would take again. Best class I have ever taken, EVER. No tests, one paper due is our final, doesn't matter how many pages. We've watched Oculus, AHS, Dr. Who & other entertainment in class. Love him.
He's the best ever! You don't have test, you have 4 papers, he's hilarious and he wants you to have fun. He's not strict and you'll never be bored.
Literally best teacher ever. Most of the class we just called about monsters, and had debates. Watched a film for 2 days. and 1 assignment due for the ENTIRE semester. Just 1 paper. he is the best!

Professor Broome is very laid back and gives you options for papers. He gives really good feedback on papers as well. There are no test but there are 4 papers, none more than 5 pages long. A lot of times we get out of class early or just watch youtube videos. Really cool guy and really loves writing.

He's honestly very cool and relatively chill. I can't remember a time that we actually spent the entire time in class because he usually let us out early every time. We would usually only be in class for 30 minutes. Essays are simple and clear and he's not a harsh grader. He's very nice and very funny. Taking again for ENG1102.

Super easy grader. Takes attendance, But you could pass without going. Keep up with assignments and you're good. He's super funny. We watched a lot of videos. Hardly ever stayed in class the whole time. Didn't learn much though. Fun assignments.
